posts.title: Day 58 & 59
posts.description:
Week 2 of @_nightsweekends s5

Building Authentication of Workout Buddy Web App.

Last 2 days I worked on:
1. Setting the Initial Auth Status to keep the user logged in.
2. Building a toy version of my idea.

posts.title: Day 57
posts.description:
Week 2 of @_nightsweekends s5

Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist. Building Authentication of Workout Buddy Web App.

Today I worked on a custom useLogin hook to log users in to the app.

posts.title: Day 56
posts.description:
Week 2 of @_nightsweekends s5

Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist. Building Authentication of Workout Buddy Web App.

Today I worked on useLogout hook to log users out of the app.

posts.title: Day 55
posts.description:
Week 1 of @_nightsweekends s5

Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist. Building Authentication of Workout Buddy Web App.

Today I submitted s5 week #1 update and worked on reusable useSignup hook to signup new users to the app.

posts.title: Day 54
posts.description:
Week 1 of @_nightsweekends s5

Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist. Building Authentication of Workout Buddy Web App.

Today I worked on Signup and Login forms.

posts.title: Day 53
posts.description:
Week 1 of @_nightsweekends s5

Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist. Building Authentication of Workout Buddy Web App.

Today I created global user state using React Context that is available to entire app.

posts.title: Day 52
posts.description:
Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist. Building Authentication of Workout Buddy Web App.

Today I worked on static login method in backend API.

posts.title: Day 51
posts.description:
Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist. Building Authentication of Workout Buddy Web App.

Today I learned about signing tokens and sending them back to the client.

posts.title: Day 50
posts.description:
Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist. Building Authentication of Workout Buddy Web App.

Today I learned about JSON Web Tokens (JWT).

posts.title: Day 49
posts.description:
Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist. Building Authentication of Workout Buddy Web App.

Today I worked on Email and Password validation in backend API.

posts.title: Day 48
posts.description:
Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist. Building Authentication of Workout Buddy Web App.

Today I worked on:
1. Static signup method.
2. Password hashing.
3. Testing signup route using postman.

posts.title: Day 47
posts.description:
Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist. Building Authentication of Workout Buddy Web App.

Today I worked on the controller, model, and routes for user authentication.

posts.title: Day 46
posts.description:
Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist. Building Workout Buddy Web App.

Today I learned to format the date of workout creation using date-fns package and added material icons.

posts.title: Day 45
posts.description:
Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist. Building Workout Buddy Web App.

Today I learned to handle error responses in WorkoutForm component.

posts.title: Day 44
posts.description:
Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist. Building Workout Buddy Web App.

Today I learned about:
1. Deleting single workout document by making fetch request to Backend API.
2. Updating the global context state so that UI updates with new state.

posts.title: Day 43
posts.description:
Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist.

Today I learned about:
1. Creating a React Context to provide global workouts state to entire React application.
2. Creating custom useWorkoutsContext hook to access and update the global context state.

posts.title: Day 42
posts.description:
Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist. Building Workout Buddy Web App.

Today I worked on WorkoutForm component to add new workouts to the Database.

posts.title: Day 41
posts.description:
Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist.

Today I worked on:
1. Home component to fetch workouts data from Backend API and used proxy field in package.json file to avoid CORS issue.
2. WorkoutDetails component to show details of each workout.

posts.title: Day 40
posts.description:
Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist. Started frontend React part.

Today I worked on:
1. Routing System for Workout Buddy MERN app.
2. Home component.
3. Reusable Navbar component.

posts.title: Day 39
posts.description:
Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist

Today I learned to create controller functions to delete and update single document.

posts.title: Day 38
posts.description:
Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist

Today I learned to create controller functions for API routes.

posts.title: Day 37
posts.description:
Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist

Today I learned about:
1. Creating models and schemas for database collection using mongoose.
2. Creating a new document using mongoose and testing it using postman.

posts.title: Day 36
posts.description:
Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist

Today I learned about:
1. Setting up MongoDB Atlas.
2. Using mongoose to connect with MongoDB database.

posts.title: Day 35
posts.description:
Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist

Today I learned about:
1. Express Router.
2. API Routes.

posts.title: Day 34
posts.description:
Learning MERN Stack from Net Ninja's Playlist

Today I learned about:
1. Setting up express app.
2. Express Middleware.
3. Using environment variables to store sensitive information.
4. Using postman to simulate requests and test routes.

posts.title: Day 31 & 32
posts.description:
Finished working on Expenses chart component challenge by @frontendmentor

1. Expenses can be viewed by hovering over each bar.
2. Current day's bar is highlighted in different color.
3. The size of bars are dynamically calculated from JSON file.

posts.title: Day 30
posts.description:
Finished working on the last project from #JavaScript30 challenge by @wesbos

Today I learned to make a Whack-A-Mole game where players can score by clicking on the disappearing moles within 10 seconds.

Link: https://junayedrahaman50.github.io/JavaScript30/30-Whack-A-Mole/

posts.title: Day 29
posts.description:
Finished working on Project 29 from #JavaScript30 challenge by @wesbos

Today I learned to implement a countdown timer where users can set a timer using preset times or by submitting a form.

Link: https://junayedrahaman50.github.io/JavaScript30/29-Countdown-Timer/

posts.title: Day 28
posts.description:
Finished working on Project 28 from #JavaScript30 challenge by @wesbos

Today I learned to implement a slider that controls video playback rate.

GitHub link: https://github.com/junayedrahaman50/JavaScript30

posts.title: Day 27
posts.description:
Finished working on Project 27 from #JavaScript30 challenge by @wesbos

Today I learned to implement click and drag horizontal scrolling using mouse events, and pageX, offsetLeft, scrollLeft properties.

GitHub link: https://github.com/junayedrahaman50/JavaScript30

posts.title: Day 26
posts.description:
Finished working on Project 26 from #JavaScript30 challenge by @wesbos

Today I learned to implement follow along navigation using getBoundingClientRect() method, and mouseenter, mouseleave events.

GitHub link: https://github.com/junayedrahaman50/JavaScript30

posts.title: Day 25
posts.description:
Finished working on Project 25 from #JavaScript30 challenge by @wesbos

Today I learned about Event Capture, Propagation, Bubbling, and once.

GitHub link: https://github.com/junayedrahaman50/JavaScript30

posts.title: Day 24
posts.description:
Finished working on Project 24 Sticky Nav from #JavaScript30 challenge by @wesbos

Today I learned to create sticky navigation bar with animations that works based on vertical scroll position of the window(window.scrollY).

Link: https://junayedrahaman50.github.io/JavaScript30/24-Sticky-Nav/

posts.title: Day 23
posts.description:
Finished working on Project 23 Speech Synthesis from #JavaScript30 challenge by @wesbos

Today I learned to create text-to-speech web app using SpeechSynthesis and SpeechSynthesisUtterance interface of Web Speech API.

Link: https://junayedrahaman50.github.io/JavaScript30/23-Speech-Synthesis/

posts.title: Day 22
posts.description:
Finished working on Project 22 Follow Along Link Highlighter from #JavaScript30 challenge by @wesbos

Today I learned to make a follow-along link highlighter using getBoundingClientRect() method that provides element's size and position.

posts.title: Day 21
posts.description:
Finished working on Project 21 Geolocation from #JavaScript30 challenge by @wesbos

Today I learned to access user's location using Geolocation API and made an web app that shows user's speed and direction.

GitHub link: https://github.com/junayedrahaman50/JavaScript30

posts.title: Day 20
posts.description:
Finished working on Project 20 Speech Detection from #JavaScript30 challenge by @wesbos

Today I learned about different events, properties, and methods of SpeechRecognition interface and built a web app that generates transcripts while speaking.

posts.title: Day 19
posts.description:
Finished working on Project 19 Webcam Fun from #JavaScript30 challenge by @wesbos

Today I learned to access user's camera, draw video feed to canvas, apply filters, and take snapshot. I have modified the UI and added buttons to apply filters.

posts.title: Day 18
posts.description:
Finished working on Project 18 Adding Up Times with Reduce from #JavaScript30 challenge by @wesbos

Today I learned to add up values in data attribute to calculate total time using map and reduce method.

GitHub link: https://github.com/junayedrahaman50/JavaScript30

posts.title: Day 17
posts.description:
Finished working on Project 17 Sort Without Articles from #JavaScript30 challenge by @wesbos

Today I learned to sort an array by removing articles(a, an, the) from array elements.

GitHub link: https://github.com/junayedrahaman50/JavaScript30

posts.title: Day 16
posts.description:
Finished working on Project 16 Mouse Move Shadow from #JavaScript30 challenge by @wesbos

Today I learned to calculate text-shadow of an element based on mouse movement.

GitHub link: https://github.com/junayedrahaman50/JavaScript30

posts.description:

posts.description:

posts.description:
